alert.note: Alert for Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jones, central Craven and northeastern Onslow Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trent Woods, or near New Bern, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Rhems, Croatan, Riverdale, Catfish Lake, Neuse Forest, Coastal Carolina Regional Airport and Pollocksville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Southern Craven
